short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens a new fullscreen tab of the embeded FeedbackFruits video player on blackboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you visit a BlackBoard page that has a FeedbackFruits video embedded in it you can't fullscreen the video. With this extension you can. Just visit the page on BlackBoard with the video on it and click the extension. The video will open in a new tab and the fullscreen option will be available.
